snippet: Phil Hughes arrived in spring training in much better shape than last year, knowing he had a lot to make up for.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Phil Hughes, who is competing for spot in the rotation, gives mediocre performance in spring training exhibition game against Pittsburgh Pirates.
lead_paragraph: Phil Hughes arrived in spring training in much better shape than last year, knowing he had a lot to make up for.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Hughes Reports in Better Condition
headline.main: In First Game, Fitter Hughes Finds Life in Fastball
headline.print_headline: In First Game, Fitter Hughes Finds Life in Fastball
